scripts.start-fe: echo Running FE... && cd fe && npm run dev && cd..
scripts.rebuild-fe: echo Running FE folder... && cd fe && echo Removing node_modules... && rm -rf node_modules && echo Rebuilding... && npm i && cd.. && echo Running finished and back to root!
scripts.install-env: echo Running FE folder... && cd fe && npm i && cd.. && echo Running SANITY folder... && cd sanity && npm i && cd.. && echo Running finished!
